## DocumentEditorProps interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Allows to override the default rendering behavior of the document editor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DocumentEditorProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.children.md) | <code>React.ReactNode</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The rendered document |
|  [focused](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.focused.md) | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <code>true</code> if the document is focused |
|  [hasSettings](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.hassettings.md) | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <code>true</code> if the document has rendered any settings |
|  [hasToolbar](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.hastoolbar.md) | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <code>true</code> if the document has rendered any toolbar buttons |
|  [PluginToolbar](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.plugintoolbar.md) | <code>PluginToolbar</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |
|  [settingsRef](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.settingsref.md) | <code>React.RefObject&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt;</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The rendered settings |
|  [toolbarRef](./internal__document-editor.documenteditorprops.toolbarref.md) | <code>React.RefObject&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt;</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The rendered toolbar buttons |

|  Method | Description |
